ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Did We not raise your renown high?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And did We not exalt your fame?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and granted you an exalted reputation?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have exalted your remembrance for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And have We not raised high your fame
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And exalted for you your esteem?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Did We not exalt thy fame?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: have We not given you high renown?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have upraised for thee thy renown.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did We not exalt your name?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And raised high the esteem (in which) thou (art held)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have We not raised your remembrance?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And raised for you your reputation?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And raised high for you your repute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [94:4] Did We not exalt your mention? For you are mentioned where I [God] am mentioned in the call announcing [the time for] prayer (adhān), in the [second] call to perform the prayer (iqāma), in the witnessing [‘there is no god but God, Muhammad is His Messenger’] (tashahhud), in the Friday sermon and in other instances.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And exalted thy fame) and raised your voice with the call to prayer, supplication and testification of faith, such that you are mentioned just as I am? And the Prophet (pbuh) said: "Yes, indeed!"
